Html:
Hi,

Any update on when we can expect to see the WPF Calendar control?

Cheers,
Jon

Hi Jon,

The Calendar/DatePicker will be available with V1 of the DataGrid which we are releasing during PDC next week!

Thanks,
Samantha
Samantha, that is super awesome.  Congrats on your forthcoming release - The Grid CTP is very nice.  I just put together something really cool for a project I am working on using it.

That's great :-)  Definitely try out V1 and let us know what you think!

Thanks,
Samantha

Hi,
    I got an exception while switching the IsEnabled property of the DatePicker in WPF V1 to false. The exception is shown below. Is there any solution for this or is there any other method for preventing user from editing the selecteddate of the datepicker

InvalidOperationException
'PART_DisabledVisual' name cannot be found in the name scope of 'System.Windows.Controls.Grid'.
